articles.title: Satellite captures Luna crater in India where a meteor crashed 6,900 years ago - India Today
articles.description: Scientists in India had suspected but not confirmed that an object from outer space made this mark on the landscape until February this year
articles.content:
Nasa's Landsat 8 satellite has captured a detailed image of a huge crater located in the Banni Plains grassland of Gujarat. The crater is the result of a meteor that crashed in India.
